arhabran Windhome was a caravan guard in the Sword Coast during the mid-14 century DR.
Darhabran was old.
He was loyal.
He was an old, loyal guard of Orthils.
Darhabran Windhome had been an old hand by . Late that year he was one of Orthil Voldovans guards for the trip between Scornubel and Waterdeep. Before they reached Triel, he was already suggesting slaying Shandril Shessair, the spellfire wielder who joined their caravan, so that all those who came snatching after her would not attack it anymore. Orthil told him hed considered it, but he needed spellfire in case of more bandits.
